Title: Altruist
Description: First bounty you manually award on another person's question

Title: Benefactor
Description: First bounty you manually award on your own question

Title: Curious
Description: Ask a well-received question on 5 separate days and maintain a positive question record

Title: Inquisitive
Description: Ask a well-received question on 30 separate days and maintain a positive question record

Title: Socratic
Description: Ask a well-received question on 100 separate days and maintain a positive question record

Title: Favorite Question
Description: Question favorited by 25 users

Title: Stellar Question
Description: Question favorited by 100 users

Title: Investor
Description: First bounty you offer on another person's question

Title: Nice Question
Description: Question score of 10 or more

Title: Good Question
Description: Question score of 25 or more

Title: Great Question
Description: Question score of 100 or more

Title: Popular Question
Description: Question with 1000 views

Title: Notable Question
Description: Question with 2500 views

Title: Famous Question
Description: Question with 10000 views

Title: Promoter
Description: First bounty you offer on your own question

Title: Scholar
Description: Ask a question and accept an answer

Title: Student
Description: First question with score of 1 or more

Title: Tumbleweed
Description: Asked a question with zero score no answers no comments and low views for a week

Title: Enlightened
Description: First to answer and accepted with score of 10 or more

Title: Explainer
Description: Edit and answer 1 question (both actions within 12 hours answer score > 0)

Title: Refiner
Description: Edit and answer 50 questions (both actions within 12 hours answer score > 0)

Title: Illuminator
Description: Edit and answer 500 questions (both actions within 12 hours answer score > 0)

Title: Generalist
Description: Provide non-wiki answers of 15 total score in 20 of top 40 tags

Title: Guru
Description: Accepted answer and score of 40 or more

Title: Nice Answer
Description: Answer score of 10 or more

Title: Good Answer
Description: Answer score of 25 or more

Title: Great Answer
Description: Answer score of 100 or more

Title: Populist
Description: Highest scoring answer that outscored an accepted answer with score of more than 10 by more than 2x

Title: Reversal
Description: Provide an answer of +20 score to a question of -5 score

Title: Revival
Description: Answer more than 30 days after a question was asked as first answer scoring 2 or more

Title: Necromancer
Description: Answer a question more than 60 days later with score of 5 or more

Title: Self-Learner
Description: Answer your own question with score of 3 or more

Title: Teacher
Description: Answer a question with score of 1 or more

Title: Tenacious
Description: Zero score accepted answers: more than 5 and 20% of total

Title: Unsung Hero
Description: Zero score accepted answers: more than 10 and 25% of total

Title: Autobiographer
Description: Complete "About Me" section of user profile

Title: Caucus
Description: Visit an election during any phase of an active election and have enough reputation to cast a vote

Title: Constituent
Description: Vote for a candidate in the final phase of an election

Title: Commentator
Description: Leave 10 comments

Title: Pundit
Description: Leave 10 comments with score of 5 or more

Title: Enthusiast
Description: Visit the site each day for 30 consecutive days. (Days are counted in UTC.)

Title: Fanatic
Description: Visit the site each day for 100 consecutive days. (Days are counted in UTC.)

Title: Mortarboard
Description: Earn at least 200 reputation (the daily maximum) in a single day

Title: Epic
Description: Earn 200 daily reputation 50 times

Title: Legendary
Description: Earn 200 daily reputation 150 times

Title: Precognitive
Description: Followed the Area 51 proposal for this site before it entered the commitment phase

Title: Beta
Description: Voted 10 times added 3 posts score > 0 and visited the site on 3 separate days during the private beta

Title: Quorum
Description: One post with score of 2 on meta

Title: Convention
Description: 10 posts with score of 2 on meta

Title: Talkative
Description: Post 10 messages with 1 or more starred in chat

Title: Outspoken
Description: Post 10 messages in chat starred by 10 different users

Title: Yearling
Description: Active member for a year earning at least 200 reputation

Title: Citizen Patrol
Description: First flagged post

Title: Deputy
Description: Raise 80 helpful flags

Title: Marshal
Description: Raise 500 helpful flags

Title: Civic Duty
Description: Vote 300 or more times

Title: Cleanup
Description: First rollback

Title: Constable
Description: Served as a pro-tem moderator for at least 1 year or through site graduation

Title: Sheriff
Description: Served as an elected moderator for at least 1 year

Title: Critic
Description: First down vote

Title: Custodian
Description: Complete at least one review task. This badge is awarded once per review type

Title: Reviewer
Description: Complete at least 250 review tasks. This badge is awarded once per review type

Title: Steward
Description: Complete at least 1000 review tasks. This badge is awarded once per review type

Title: Disciplined
Description: Delete own post with score of 3 or higher

Title: Editor
Description: First edit

Title: Strunk & White
Description: Edit 80 posts

Title: Copy Editor
Description: Edit 500 posts (excluding own or deleted posts and tag edits)

Title: Electorate
Description: Vote on 600 questions and 25% or more of total votes are on questions

Title: Excavator
Description: Edit first post that was inactive for 6 months

Title: Archaeologist
Description: Edit 100 posts that were inactive for 6 months

Title: Organizer
Description: First retag

Title: Peer Pressure
Description: Delete own post with score of -3 or lower

Title: Proofreader
Description: Approve or reject 100 suggested edits

Title: Sportsmanship
Description: Up vote 100 answers on questions where an answer of yours has a positive score

Title: Suffrage
Description: Use 30 votes in a day

Title: Supporter
Description: First up vote

Title: Synonymizer
Description: First approved tag synonym

Title: Tag Editor
Description: First tag wiki edit

Title: Research Assistant
Description: Edit 50 tag wikis

Title: Taxonomist
Description: Create a tag used by 50 questions

Title: Vox Populi
Description: Use the maximum 40 votes in a day

Title: Analytical
Description: Visited every section of the FAQ (retired)

Title: Announcer
Description: Share a link to a question later visited by 25 unique IP addresses

Title: Booster
Description: Share a link to a question later visited by 300 unique IP addresses

Title: Publicist
Description: Share a link to a question later visited by 1000 unique IP addresses

Title: Census
Description: Completed the annual Stack Overflow survey; your responses are anonymous

Title: Informed
Description: Read the entire tour page

Title: Not a Robot
Description: Met a Stack Overflow employee at an event where Stack Overflow was an organizer or participant with 50 or more attendees

Title: Documentation Beta
Description: Contributed 3+ substantive pieces of documentation during the private beta

Title: Documentation Pioneer
Description: Contributed 3+ substantive pieces of documentation in the first month of documentation

Title: Documentation User
Description: Earned at least one badge for contributing to Stack Overflow Documentation
